name: Edge of Tomorrow VR
description:
Edge of Tomorrow is a short experience developed at Hanze Hogeschool during the minor Digital Product Lab in Groningen, with the collaboration of the Northern Police. The objective of this product is to start a conversation amongst youth in class in a fun and interesting manner and then draw conclusions and discuss about the topic. The experience was developed by 5 students from Digital Product Lab in one semester.

The target platform is the Meta Quest 2, however a Windows version is also available to download!
